description: Writes a datatable to a SQLite DB file.

input.name: sqlite
input.description: The SQLite DB file to which the data to will exported.

input.name: table name
input.description: The name of an existing table in the SQLite file to which the data to will exported.

input.name: id column name
input.description: The name of column which contains unique row IDs.

output.name: sqlite
output.description: A file in SQLite format with the data to exported.

output.name: ids
output.description: A list of created and updated row IDs.

output.name: created ids
output.description: A list of created row IDs.

output.name: updated ids
output.description: A list of updated row IDs.
